summary: KVM: x86: fix typo in __try_cmpxchg_user causing non-atomicness
details:
KVM: x86: fix typo in __try_cmpxchg_user causing non-atomicness

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit 3360b29128a667a2f36ad05aa80c2825b9a2c5a0, it was introduced in version v5.17.13 by commit b0f294103f4cf733e23d3f0c4e5fd58e42998921. For more details please see the references link.
